firstSideCard.heading: The autumn is great
firstSideCard.text1: Fantasic kayak tours in the archipelago, hiking tours with butter fried mushrooms for dinner. Autumn with all its colors is a fantastic period for small outdoor adventures
firstSideCard.text2: O Lord, how great is the number of your works! in wisdom you have made them all; the earth is full of the things you have made. Ps 104:24
